events.title: Richard and Mildred Loving plead guilty

movie.title: Loving
movie.plot: The story of Richard and Mildred Loving, a couple whose arrest for interracial marriage in 1960s Virginia began a legal battle that would end with the Supreme Court's historic 1967 decision.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 25 wins & 85 nominations.

events.title: ice skater Nancy Kerrigan is attacked and injured by Shane Stant

movie.title: I, Tonya
movie.plot: Competitive ice skater Tonya Harding rises amongst the ranks at the U.S. Figure Skating Championships, but her future in the activity is thrown into doubt when her ex-husband intervenes.

events.title: ice skater Nancy Kerrigan is attacked and injured by Shane Stant

movie.title: Tonya & Nancy: The Inside Story
movie.plot: Based on the true story of Tonya Harding and Nancy Kerrigan, rivals for the USA Olympic Ice Skating team. When Kerrigan is savagely attacked, people begin to wonder if the intense rivalry between the two was motivation for someone.

events.title: the Boston Globe's Spotlight team publish their story on child sexual abuse in the Catholic church

movie.title: Spotlight
movie.plot: When the Boston Globe's tenacious "Spotlight" team of reporters delves into allegations of abuse in the Catholic Church, their year-long investigation uncovers a decades-long cover-up at the highest levels of Boston's religious, legal, and government establishment, touching off a wave of revelations around the world.
